text: 18 Dec 2018, Professor Asmerom Legesse and author of the OROMO DEMOCRACY: An Indigenous African Political System, received an honorary degree from Addis Ababa University.  Asmerom is well known for the relentless efforts he has done to introduce Gada system to the world. https://t.co/SBKQuphWpk
